description: A Full stack web app of furniture resale market. The Personal is a full stack website built by React JS, Node JS, Express JS and MongoDB. This is a resale product website that focuses on furniture. Three types of user are available in this web app such as Admin, Buyer & Seller.
coreFeatures: Three types of user available here (Admin, Buyer, Seller)
Admin can do - Manage User, manage Products and get flag report
Seller can post product, advertise product, modify and delete product
Buyer can do make order and add products to wish list
This website has a review section in where buyer can post review
